name: CHRONOGON (GummyLeeches, Stevus Brevus)
description:
CHRONOGON is a minimal arcade action game inspired by Tempest, Galaga, and Super Hexagon

Developed by GummyLeeches and Stevus Brevus

Music by Cageaboom1

You can listen to the OST here!

Made for Mini Jam 12: Chrono

How to Play

Use the LEFT arrow to turn counter-clockwise along the circle, and RIGHT arrow to move clockwise along the circle. Press SPACE to shoot.

Touching the clock's big hand while it's extended will kill you, and touch enemies or their projectiles will kill you.

Can you get the fabled S+ ranking? (or maybe even the extremely difficult X ranking...)
